name: Last Moment Opening
description:
Welcome to the Last Moment Opening!
Prepare your just purchased building for opening and accommodating visitors from around the globe.
Start by hiring staff and cleaning, improving the building you just purchased.
Manage rooms by ratings and set their prices for better income. 
And when the time is ready, open up and continue to maintain a good impression to the visitors!
Also, you have a limited time before the opening!
Good Luck!

How to play:

  • Hire workers ( don't forget to assign workers to reception )
  • Clean up and fix some broken items
  • When ready Open your bizzzness
  • Try to fix and clean stuff after opening
  • After a while get your result of the day!

Little more info:
I worked on the game in the evenings and spent six crazy evenings in total!
Everything is handmade, as you may notice :D
It still has some bugs and no sound, but I will try to update that stuff a bit later.
( was running out of time for the JAM, but who has the time )
